scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:tmp
scripts.make: npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm run pack
